name: immortal: mors tud, vita mea
description:
A hololive fangame made in RPG Maker MV, 'immortal: -mors tud, vita mea-' is a short 45-60 minute game where you play as Kiara, a phoenix lost in the afterlife trying to find her reaper friend, Calliope, before her soul forgets what it means to be alive.

This game was made over the course of a few weeks and has two endings depending on your final actions. 

~ CREDITS ~

Visual Credits:

  • Game Logo,  Calliope CGs, and Calliope Battle Sprite drawn by ministarfruit
  • All other art + story done by me, idaate

Music:

  •  City Life - Artificial.Music
  • Jazz Background Music - Music for Video Library
  • Abandoned Cementary - TeknoAXE
  • Forever - Whitesand
  • Battle Groove - Jason Donnelly 
  • Keep Going - Muyu
